metadata.title: CVE-2012-3534 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
GNU Gatekeeper before 3.1 does not limit the number of connections to thestatus port, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(connection and thread consumption) via a large number of connections.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-3534` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gnugk - 2:3.0.2-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gnugk package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:3.0.2-2').
